file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 21-31-08-02 - AIR FILTER - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL AIR FILTER - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. The air filter is installed on the rear pressure bulkhead and it has a filter element that can be discarded and replaced when necessary. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 21-31-08-960-801-A ♦ AIR FILTER ELEMENT - REPLACEMENT EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 21-31-08 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-31-08-960-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. AIR FILTER ELEMENT - REPLACEMENT A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to replace the air filter element. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - IPC 21-30-00 PRESSURIZATION DISTRIBUTION SYSTEM C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Rear fuselage I D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expendable Parts IPC REFERENCE ITEM QTY (VENDOR REFERENCE) Air Filter IPC 21-30-00 1 H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In rear fuselage I I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Open access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). J. Replace Air Filter Element (Figure 201) SUBTASK 960-002-A (1) Remove the air filter element from the air filter. (2) Discard the air filter element. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 960-801-A/200 21-31-08 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Install a new air filter element in the air filter. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 960-801-A/200 21-31-08 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
